title: Emerald and Diamond Jhumka Earrings - Ramyatha Collection
materials: Freshwater Pearl. Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Intricately designed Jhumkas featuring a floral motif above a dome-shaped lower portion. The emerald centerpiece is surrounded by sparkling CZ diamonds. The dome is adorned with delicate filigree work, culminating in a single, elegant freshwater pearl at the bottom. Inspired by traditional temple jewelry.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Dussehra
and special events. Ideal for pairing with a Kanjeevaram saree or a lehenga choli.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship blending traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The vibrant emerald and dazzling diamonds create a luxurious and eye-catching effect. The freshwater pearl adds a touch of sophistication. A valuable addition to any jewelry collection, representing timeless beauty and cultural heritage. Durable and long-lasting thanks to the high-quality materials and Hyderabadi polish.
